title: Blackrock's Chaudhuri: Expect 2 More Fed Cuts
description: Gargi Chaudhuri, Head of iShares Investment Strategy Americas at BlackRock, says the Fed is likely to deliver two rate cuts. She tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that going into 2026, there are multiple positive impulses for growth. (Source: Bloomberg)
